text: What are the Amazon EC2 API tools?
choiceList: A. They don’t exist. The Amazon EC2 AMI tools, instead, are used to manage permissions.
B. Command-line tools to the Amazon EC2 web service
C. They are a set of graphical tools to manage EC2 instances.
D. They don’t exist. The Amazon API tools are a client interface to Amazon Web Services.

text: When a user is launching an instance with EC2, which of the below mentioned options is not available during the instance launch console for a key pair?
choiceList: A. Proceed without the key pair
B. Upload a new key pair
C. Select an existing key pair
D. Create a new key pair
